description: So, you're lost in the desert, and Dash decides it's the perfect time to learn some new dance moves. If you can't stop them, join them.

hints.description: Make sure the Move To state is set to 50 cm in the forward direction. Link the state with an Auto cue.

puzzles.description: After moving forward, make Dash automatically spin to 90 degrees.
puzzles.introduction:
Straight as an arrow!  
Now let's turn it up!

hints.description: Make sure the Spin To state is set to 90 degrees. Link the state with an Auto cue.

puzzles.description: After spinning right, make Dash automatically play a silly sound.
puzzles.introduction:
This is headed in a great direction!  
Now let's add some sound when Dash turns around!

hints.description: Link the state with an Auto cue.

puzzles.description: After the silly sound, make Dash automatically move forward 50 cm again.
puzzles.introduction:
That's a turn for the better!  
Let's add a link to make Dash move forever!

hints.description: Make a loop! Link the states with an Auto cue. Run the program and wait until Dash makes a square!
